"A good small size shuttle to provide medical care throughout the sector. Manufactured by Langstad-Voigt Heavy Industries."
# Tips on running LVHI Searchlight shuttles - The total power load for the shuttle in standard complectation is 26 [bold]kW[/bold] without the freezer unit running and 30 [bold]kW[/bold] with the freezer unit running set to the lowest temperature. Consider switching off the stasis beds when they aren't needed to conserve power. For more general info on the power grid, see the guidebook article [textlink="Power" link="Power"]. - For more general info on cryogenics see the guidebook article about [textlink="Cryogenics" link="Cryogenics"]. - For more general info on medical bounties see the guidebook article about [textlink="Medical Bounties" link="MedicalBounties"]. - For basics of shuttle piloting see [textlink="Piloting" link="Piloting"].
